A Souvenir of the Opera
Shipton Manor, Shipton-on-Cherwell, Oxfordshire, England, UK Open to "Class B" Oxford association bands. 5 bands played.
1st prize: Hawkes & Son Challenge Shield, £5 2nd prize: £3 3rd prize: £2 Medals for trombone, euphonium, horn, solo cornet.
Oct. 9, 2013, 10:22 a.m. March 29, 2017, 11:31 a.m.
